name: BigDates Solutions
tag_list: reminder-service, reminders, birthdays, anniversaries, greeting-cards, gift-reminders, paper-greeting-cards, ecommerce, iphone, facebook-app, application
overview:
Create and Capitalize on Non-Holiday Commerce Opportunities BigDates Solutions helps companies create and capitalize on marketing opportunities surrounding birthdays, anniversaries, and other special occasions. As more and more companies engage in email marketing during the holidays, and as it becomes increasingly difficult to rise above the holiday marketing noise, the leading retailers will be those that find more ‘exclusive’ opportunities to showcase their products and services.

This includes ASP & Enterprise Reminder Service Solutions as well as leading applications on Facebook and iPhone platforms.

BigDates Solutions directly operates many consumer destination sites which not only provide reminder services to members but prove to be a source for learning and testing that our licensing partners ultimately benefit from: BigDates.com, Birthday-Reminders.com, DateBoxx.com, Reminder-Center.com, Birthday-Calendar.com and GreetingCardUniverse.com.

relationships.title: President & Sr VP of Business Development
